org.springframework.transaction

接口 ReactiveTransaction

  • 所有超级接口:
    TransactionExecution
    所有已知实现类:
    GenericReactiveTransaction

    public interface ReactiveTransaction
extends TransactionExecution
    Representation of an ongoing reactive transaction. This is currently a marker interface extending TransactionExecution but may acquire further methods in a future revision.

    Transactional code can use this to retrieve status information, and to programmatically request a rollback (instead of throwing an exception that causes an implicit rollback).

    从以下版本开始:
    5.2
    作者:
    Mark Paluch, Juergen Hoeller
    另请参阅:
    TransactionExecution.setRollbackOnly(), ReactiveTransactionManager.getReactiveTransaction(org.springframework.transaction.TransactionDefinition)

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.transaction.TransactionExecution

        isCompleted, isNewTransaction, isRollbackOnly, setRollbackOnly
